rooms.description: Large living area with open design. Placed in the east to harness morning light according to Vastu principles.
Open dining space adjacent to the living room. Vastu aligned with entrance.
Modern kitchen setup with sufficient ventilation and natural light; includes a window on the south wall for energy flow.
Compact space for the servants quarters located towards the west side to ensure privacy and functionality.
Balcony adjacent to one bedroom; designed to maximize views of the garden.

openings.description: Main entrance aligned with north as per Vastu to ensure positive energy flow.
Large window opening for abundant morning light in the living room.
Window to enhance natural light and ventilation.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with private balcony and garden view; located in the north for auspicious energy.
Additional bedroom featuring a spacious balcony designed to overlook the serene garden.
Balcony attached to master bedroom for additional outdoor space and relaxation.
Spacious balcony for the second bedroom offering privacy and garden views.

openings.description: Staircase leading to the first floor with adequate ventilation and natural light.
Window for master bedroom balcony ensuring fresh air circulation.
Balcony window for second bedroom to optimize light and air flow.

rooms.description: Large garden area designed for relaxation and outdoor gatherings; central to the plot.
